---
title: "CPRD Tutorial"
---

Hello,

This website offers a **simple tutorial** for working with **CPRD Aurum** and **CPRD GOLD** datasets, with practical examples in both **SAS** and **R**. 

Basic data structures and operations are included. More examples on data management will be considered in the future work.

Use the navigation bar to explore tutorials in your preferred dataset-language version.

Note: CPRD GOLD are not yet completed, stop at clinical measurments (labs)
